metadata.name: Knife Piece Reminder
metadata.description: A simple mod that reminds you to take your knife pieces as well as to go to mausoleum - The mod will remind you on entering *Downpour 2/ Dross 2* and *Mines 2 / Ashpit 2* - Once you kill the boss on Mines 2 while having both knife pieces it will also remind you to go to mausoleum
